Class UserAgentApplication

UserAgentApplication class : UserAgentApplication Object Instance that the developer can use to make loginXX OR acquireTokenXX functions

Constructors

constructor

  • new UserAgentApplication(configuration: Configuration): UserAgentApplication
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:181

    Constructor for the UserAgentApplication object This is to be able to instantiate the UserAgentApplication object

    constructor

    Important attributes to configure are:

    • clientID: the application ID of your application. You get obtain one by registering your application with our Application registration portal : https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_AAD_IAM/ActiveDirectoryMenuBlade/RegisteredAppsPreview
    • authority: the authority URL for your application

    Parameters

    • configuration: Configuration

      object for the MSAL UserAgentApplication instance

    Returns UserAgentApplication

Accessors

authority

  • get authority(): string
  • set authority(val: string): void
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:171

    returns the authority, where authority is a URL indicating the directory that MSAL can use to obtain tokens

    • In Azure AD, this attribute is a URL indicating the Azure active directory that MSAL uses to obtain tokens It is of the form https://login.microsoftonline.com/<Enter_the_Tenant_Info_Here> If your application supports Accounts in one organizational directory, replace "Enter_the_Tenant_Info_Here" value with the Tenant Id or Tenant name (for example, contoso.microsoft.com) If your application supports Accounts in any organizational directory, replace "Enter_the_Tenant_Info_Here" value with organizations If your application supports Accounts in any organizational directory and personal Microsoft accounts, replace "Enter_the_Tenant_Info_Here" value with common. To restrict support to Personal Microsoft accounts only, replace "Enter_the_Tenant_Info_Here" value with consumers.
    • In Azure B2C, it is of the form https://<instance>/tfp/<tenant>//

    Returns string

    authority

    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:155

    setter for the authority URL

    Parameters

    • val: string

    Returns void

    authority

Methods

acquireTokenPopup

  • acquireTokenPopup(request: AuthenticationParameters): Promise<AuthResponse>
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:659

    Use when you want to obtain an access_token for your API via opening a popup window in the user's browser

    Parameters

    • request: AuthenticationParameters

    Returns Promise<AuthResponse>

    • A Promise that is fulfilled when this function has completed, or rejected if an error was raised. Returns the AuthResponse object

acquireTokenRedirect

  • acquireTokenRedirect(request: AuthenticationParameters): void
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:419

    Used when you want to obtain an access_token for your API by redirecting the user to the authorization endpoint.

    Parameters

    • request: AuthenticationParameters

    Returns void

acquireTokenSilent

  • acquireTokenSilent(request: AuthenticationParameters): Promise<AuthResponse>
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:883

    Use this function to obtain a token before every call to the API / resource provider

    MSAL return's a cached token when available Or it send's a request to the STS to obtain a new token using a hidden iframe.

    Parameters

    • request: AuthenticationParameters

    Returns Promise<AuthResponse>

    • A Promise that is fulfilled when this function has completed, or rejected if an error was raised. Returns the AuthResponse object

getAccount

  • getAccount(): Account
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:1965

    Returns the signed in account (received from an account object created at the time of login) or null when no state is found

    Returns Account

    account object stored in MSAL

getAllAccounts

  • getAllAccounts(): Array<Account>
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:2007

    Used to filter all cached items and return a list of unique accounts based on homeAccountIdentifier.

    Returns Array<Account>

    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:2223

getPostLogoutRedirectUri

  • getPostLogoutRedirectUri(): string
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:2295

    Use to get the post logout redirect uri configured in MSAL or null. Evaluates postLogoutredirectUri if its a function, otherwise simply returns its value.

    Returns string

    post logout redirect URL

getRedirectUri

  • getRedirectUri(): string
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:2282

    Use to get the redirect uri configured in MSAL or null. Evaluates redirectUri if its a function, otherwise simply returns its value.

    Returns string

    redirect URL

logout

  • logout(): void
    • Defined in UserAgentApplication.ts:1223

    Used to log out the current user, and redirect the user to the postLogoutRedirectUri. Defaults behaviour is to redirect the user to window.location.href.

    Returns void
